rules.description: Tab → Hyper when held, Tab when tapped
Right Command → Nav layer (hold) / Right Command (tap)
Hyper A → Toggle ALL windows tiling/floating
Hyper S → Left Half/Third cycle (float) / Move Left (tiled)

to.shell_command: L=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace list-windows --focused --format '%{window-layout}'); if [ "$L" = floating ]; then /Users/n0id/.local/bin/aerospace-snap left half third; else /opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace move left; fi

rules.description: Hyper F → Right Half/Third cycle (float) / Move Right (tiled)

to.shell_command: L=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace list-windows --focused --format '%{window-layout}'); if [ "$L" = floating ]; then /Users/n0id/.local/bin/aerospace-snap right half third; else /opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace move right; fi

rules.description: Hyper G → Move window to next monitor + follow + center 2/3
Hyper E → Cycle size (float) / Move Up (tiled)
Hyper D → Center Half/Third cycle (float) / Move Down (tiled)

to.shell_command: L=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace list-windows --focused --format '%{window-layout}'); if [ "$L" = floating ]; then /Users/n0id/.local/bin/aerospace-snap center half third; else /opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace move down; fi

rules.description: Hyper C → Center 2/3 (float) / Flatten + Horizontal tiles (tiled)

to.shell_command: L=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace list-windows --focused --format '%{window-layout}'); if [ "$L" = floating ]; then /Users/n0id/.local/bin/aerospace-snap center two-thirds; else /opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace flatten-workspace-tree && /opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace layout tiles horizontal; fi

L=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace list-windows --focused --format '%{window-layout}'); if [ "$L" = floating ]; then /Users/n0id/.local/bin/aerospace-snap left two-thirds; else /opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace resize smart -150; fi

L=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace list-windows --focused --format '%{window-layout}'); if [ "$L" = floating ]; then /Users/n0id/.local/bin/aerospace-snap right two-thirds; else /opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace resize smart +150; fi

rules.description: Hyper Z → Toggle float/tile (detach or reattach)

to.shell_command: L=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace list-windows --focused --format '%{window-layout}'); if [ "$L" = floating ]; then /opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace layout tiling; else /opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace layout floating; fi

rules.description: Hyper / → Sort windows by app into workspaces
